item.title: Text colors
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx”]Purpose: To change the default text color and/or effect for your client.
Classes modified: Client

So let’s get started.
First, open your Client class. Now find method73.
Find this line:

int j2 = 0;

Below this line you will see a list of text colors and the number representing each. Change the initial value of j2 to any one of these numbers.

Now, if you look farther down from here you will notice a variable being declared called i3 along with a list of chat effects. Just change i3 to any one of the numbers to change the default chat effect.

Okay, that’s it. If you have any problems or questions feel free to post them.[/quote]
